desc_short: Boosts HP and MP by 13% (Demon Rain, Dracu Lasswell, White Witch Fina, Black Cat Lid, Grim Lord Sakura, Illusionist Nichol, Pirate Jake only)
提高13%HP、MP[僅限惡魔雷因、吸血鬼拉斯韋爾、白魔女菲娜、黑貓里德、冷血貴族櫻、幻術師尼科爾、海盜傑科專用]
HP와 MP 13% 상승 [악마 레인, 드라큘라 라스웰, 하얀 마녀 피나, 검은 고양이 리드, 사신 사쿠라, 마술사 니콜, 해적 제이크 전용]
Augmente les PV et les PM de 13% (Uniquement pour Rain démoniaque, Draculasswell, Sorcière blanche Fina Chatte noire Lid, Sakura, seigneur sombre, Nichol, illusionniste et Jake, pirate)
Erhöht LP und MP um 13 % (nur Dämonen-Rain, Dracu-Lasswell, Weiße Hexe Fina, Schwarze Katze Lid, Grimmige Herrin Sakura, Illusionist Nichol, Piraten-Jake)
Aumenta la VIT y los PM un 13% (exclusiva de Rain demoniaco, Draculasswell, Fina bruja blanca, Lid minina negra, Sakura la parca, Nichol ilusionista y Jake pirata)
desc_long: Boost HP and MP by 13%. Demon Rain, Dracu Lasswell, White Witch Fina, Black Cat Lid, Grim Lord Sakura, Illusionist Nichol, Pirate Jake only.
